title: My Seal
description: My SEAL training gave me confidence and the strength to take on any challenge... Except her... I carried her picture through the mud, the live fire training, the punishment and the long lonely nights. She's the one girl I can never have. The only woman I could truly love. I'm heading home now, but I can't help but wonder what she would think of me, her stepbrother, if she only knew...  To hell with the rules. I'm coming home, and I'm going to make her mine.
author: Meghan Archer
